## Binding.createObserver() method

Creates an observer capable of notifying a subscriber when the output of a binding changes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract createObserver(subscriber: Subscriber, directive: BindingDirective): ExpressionObserver<TSource, TReturn, TParent>;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

subscriber


</td><td>

[Subscriber](../fast-element.subscriber/)


</td><td>

The subscriber to changes in the binding.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

directive


</td><td>

[BindingDirective](../fast-element.bindingdirective/)


</td><td>

The Binding directive to create the observer for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ExpressionObserver](../fast-element.expressionobserver/)<!-- -->&lt;TSource, TReturn, TParent&gt;
